AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: goblin slave trainer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Rather skilled with a sword, and with ample experience under [PAWN_possessive] belt, [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with ensuring new recruits were ready for battle. It just so happened that these recruits were actually goblins, and didn't exactly enlist willingly.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: goblin slave master
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Always good at manipulating people, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to put [PAWN_possessive] skills to work ensuring there were plentiful soldiers ready for battle. Under [PAWN_possessive] watchful eye, the goblin slave army grew larger than ever before, in more ways than one. [PAWN_nameDef] managed to create a breed of goblin larger than even an Orsimer.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: goblin slave overseer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was well known for ensuring goblin slaves were kept in line. [PAWN_pronoun] sometimes wondered whether enslaving, enlisting, and selectively breeding, a sentient race was something that a good person would do. [PAWN_nameDef] quickly banished those thoughts.
